price: Wala si kauli ya mtunga mashairi. Ni machache sana mnayo yaamini.
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Wala Qur'ani si maneno ya mtunga mashairi kama mnavyo dai. Ama nyinyi ni chache mno imani yenu ya kuwa Qur'ani inatoka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
